content: PARIS, May 5 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank will continue increasing interest rates until inflation is under control, French ECB policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Friday.

"The essence of the effort has been done, although there will probably a few more rate hikes," Villeroy said on Radio ClassiqueThe European Central Bank hiked its key deposit rate for the seventh consecutive time in a row Thursday albeit slowing the pace of the increase. (Reporting by Benoit Van Overstraeten; Editing by GV De Clercq)
